body_html:
@CorentinJ cProfile does not give accurate view because CUDA API is async.

Can you use torch.autograd.profiler to get a clear view of what's being slower or faster?
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/autograd.html#profiler

Right now your cProfile output gives 0 signal on what the problem is.
body_text:

Right now your cProfile output gives 0 signal on what the problem is.
body:
@CorentinJ cProfile does not give accurate view because CUDA API is async.

Can you use torch.autograd.profiler to get a clear view of what's being slower or faster?
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/autograd.html#profiler

Right now your cProfile output gives 0 signal on what the problem is.
